# Laboratory Services Tender Announcement

## Background
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is seeking a National Individual Standing Offer (NISO) for laboratory services to support the analysis of environmental quality samples on a national basis.

## Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) Details

* **Reference Number**: WS4079301037-Doc4095633158
* **Solicitation Number**: WS4079301037
* **Publication Date**: July 13, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: August 22, 2023, 2:00 PM EST
* **Region of Delivery**: Canada
* **Procurement Category**: Service (SRV)
* **Trade Agreements**: This notice is subject to the Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, and Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA).

## Evaluation Criteria
Bids will be evaluated on a combination of technical merit and price. The selection criteria include reproducibility, precision, accuracy, timeliness, and state-of-the-art analysis.

## Tender Description
A National Individual Standing Offer is required to provide laboratory services for the analysis of environmental quality samples on a national basis. The lab must perform analysis of trace levels of organic, inorganic, bacteriological, and physical parameters in various media, including sediments, soil, water (fresh and marine), soil vapor, and air.

## Bid Submission
All required supporting documentation and bid submissions must be submitted electronically by 2:00 PM EST on August 22, 2023.

## Contact Information
For any questions or clarifications, please contact Teresa Cuffari at [teresa.cuffari@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:teresa.cuffari@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca).
